body.p: In the Board’s view, even though no IFRS has addressed extractive activities directly, all IFRSs (including International Accounting Standards and Interpretations) are applicable to entities engaged in the exploration for and evaluation of mineral resources that make an unreserved statement of compliance with IFRSs in accordance with IAS 1 Presentation of Financial Statements. Consequently, each IFRS must be applied by all such entities.
